Blockchain simulator 1.0 documentation

Middleware Coordinator

«  Welcome to blockchain’s documentation!   ::   Contents   ::   Service Blockchain Package  »

Middleware Coordinator¶

This module has functions that coordinate all the blockchain system

class middleware.Middleware¶

This class register the required web service to coordinate all the functions of CryptoSD:Blockchain

add_web_service(name, url)¶

This function allows the middleware add new web service with a minimum of information belongs to each web service in the dictionary :param name: the name or key of the web service :type name: str :param url: the url where the web service is or will be host :type url: str

consult_found_block_chain_service(dict_parameters)¶

This function allow consume consult_found blockchain service that use the method POST :param dict_paramteres: this parameter hava all parameters for use the service blockchain :type dict_paramteres: dict :returns: this function return a response with format JSON :rtype: dict[str, Any]

consume_service(type_method, uri, dict_parameter: dict)¶

This function is used to consume a web service, and return a response, no matter if the communication fails :param type_method: the method where is going to pass the communication (POST/GET) :type param: str :param uri: the url where is located the web service to consume :type uri: str :param dict_parameter: the content of the payload :type dict_parameter: dict :returns: returns a custom dict with the url, status and content. The “Any” return is a JSON content :rtype: dict[str, Any]

load_services()¶

This function execute with the instance of Middleware, so allows to add the principals web services

Coordinator controller¶

This module perform like someone who makes the mainstage for all the components

class controller.Controller¶

This controller uwu

static consult_founds(dict_parameters)¶

This function consume a service from Blockchain to get the money in a wallet, only if this wallet is valid :param account: the wallet of the user :type account: str :returns: a dictionary with the account, founds in the wallet and the exist of the account :rtype: dict

Service coordinator Package¶

This a package that contains the main function for the service coordinator

service_coordinator.consult_founds()¶

Web service for the client, that execute the required proccess, calling all the correspond web service from the others components to get the user founds in the wallet :endpoints: http://127.0.0.1/consult_founds

service_coordinator.get_something()¶

Main page

service_coordinator.run_service_coordinator(host: str, port: int)¶

This function runs the service coordinator that allow comunicate diferents services

Parameters

  • host (str) – the ip where the app will be host

  • port (int) – port is a localport controled for specfic OS

service_coordinator.transaction_register()¶

Web service for the client, that execute all the required proccess to valid a transaction and add to the block the new transaction, before add the complete block to the blockchain :endpoints: http://127.0.0.1/register_transaction

Main coordinator¶

This module run the coordinator app

main_coordinator.main()¶

This function allows the user to start the app with or without debug mode, and put the ip and port of the coordinator app
